passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]]. If the target is a champion, inflict them with ''Expose Weakness'' for 4 seconds, causing them to take {{rd|8%|5%}} increased damage from all sources ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.
